software-engineer.title: Software Engineer
sampleBullets: Developed scalable APIs serving 1M+ users with 99.9% uptime
Reduced deployment time by 60% using CI/CD pipelines and automated testing
Led migration from monolith to microservices architecture, improving system scalability
Optimized database queries reducing response time by 40%
Mentored 5 junior developers on best coding practices and design patterns
commonResponsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain software applications
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews and architecture discussions

data-analyst.title: Data Analyst
sampleBullets: Analyzed customer behavior data to identify $2M in revenue opportunities
Built interactive dashboards in Tableau reducing reporting time by 70%
Automated ETL processes saving 15 hours/week of manual work
Conducted A/B tests resulting in 25% increase in conversion rates
Created predictive models with 85% accuracy for customer churn
commonResponsibilities: Extract, transform, and analyze large datasets
Create visualizations and reports for stakeholders
Identify trends and patterns in data

product-manager.title: Product Manager
sampleBullets: Launched 3 major features increasing MAU by 40% and revenue by $1.5M
Led cross-functional team of 12 engineers and designers through agile sprints
Defined product roadmap based on customer feedback and market research
Increased user engagement by 35% through data-driven feature prioritization
Reduced customer churn by 20% through improved onboarding experience

Analyze metrics to inform product decisions

Reduced medication errors by 30% through implementation of double-check protocols
Mentored 8 new graduate nurses during 12-month orientation program
Achieved 95% patient satisfaction scores through excellent bedside manner
Collaborated with multidisciplinary team to improve patient outcomes by 25%

Trained 10 new team members on customer service best practices
